alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:51PM CDT until April 04 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clayton County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1051 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Volga to near Lamont, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Volga around 1055 PM CDT. Elkader around 1105 PM CDT. Edgewood around 1110 PM CDT. Garnavillo around 1120 PM CDT. Colesburg around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Camp C.S. Klaus, Mederville, Garber, Wood, Motor, Communia and Highways 3 And 187. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
